example.question: Four significantly different household appliances (blender, mixer, toaster, and food processor) are plugged into four outlets along a counter. Turning on or off one or more of the appliances does not affect the performance of the other appliances because the four appliances

prompt:
Accurately answer the following question:

Four significantly different household appliances (blender, mixer, toaster, and food processor) are plugged into four outlets along a counter. Turning on or off one or more of the appliances does not affect the performance of the other appliances because the four appliances

Choices:
A. run on a direct current.
B. are connected in series.
C. are connected in parallel.
D. run on an alternating current.


Instructions:
- Carefully read the question and all options.
- Select the single most correct answer.
- Respond ONLY in the following format: "The correct answer is A/B/C/D".
- Do not include any explanations, additional text, or punctuation besides the answer.
